items.title: watchOS 26 新增手势以关闭通知 (原标题: watchOS 26 Features New Gesture to Dismiss Notifications)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
watchOS 26 引入了一项新的单手腕部轻拂手势，方便用户关闭通知。该功能仅适用于较新的 Apple Watch 型号，包括 Apple Watch Series 9、Apple Watch 10 和 Apple Watch Ultra 2。

*   **手势操作：** 当抬起手腕查看通知但暂时不想回复时，只需轻拂手腕（翻转并返回）即可关闭通知。此手势可用于关闭通知和来电，使定时器和闹钟静音，并返回到表盘。
*   **技术原理：** 该功能利用手表中的加速度计和陀螺仪，以及分析手腕运动的机器学习模型。
*   **Liquid Glass 设计：** watchOS 26 界面采用了 Apple 全新的 Liquid Glass 设计。
*   **Workout Buddy 功能：** Apple Intelligence 支持新的 Workout Buddy 功能，该功能提供个性化的语音激励。
*   **Workout 应用：** Workout 应用采用了新的布局，并根据用户的品味和锻炼类型提供音乐。
*   **Live Translation：** Apple Watch 现在还支持在 Messages 中进行实时翻译。

![wrist flick dismiss notifications](https://images.macrumors.com/t/392uyDblECO3Hq_zxHBCJduOhUM=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/wrist-flick-dismiss-notifications.jpg?lossy)
![2025 06 10 10](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/06/2025-06-10-10.13.47%E2%80%AFam.gif)

watchOS 26 现已通过 Apple Developer Program 提供测试版，公开测试版将于下个月通过 Apple Beta Software Program 提供。
items.shortSummary: watchOS 26为Apple Watch Series 9、10和Ultra 2引入了新的单手腕部轻拂手势，方便用户关闭通知、来电，使定时器和闹钟静音。该功能利用加速度计、陀螺仪和机器学习模型分析手腕运动。watchOS 26还采用了Liquid Glass设计，并新增了Workout Buddy功能，提供个性化语音激励。Workout应用也进行了重新设计，并支持Messages中的实时翻译。目前开发者可以测试该版本，公开测试版将于下个月推出。
items.translated_title: watchOS 26 新增手势以关闭通知
items.content:
Apple in watchOS 26 has added a new one-handed wrist-flick gesture to easily dismiss notifications, but the gesture only works on newer Apple Watch models.


When you raise your wrist to check a notification but aren’t ready to respond, you can now simply flick your wrist – turn it over and back – to dismiss it. The quick gesture lets you dismiss notifications and incoming calls, silence timers and alarms, and return to the watch face.

It works by using the accelerometer and gyroscope in your watch, along with a machine learning model that analyzes your wrist movement. However, the functionality is limited to Apple Watch Series 9, Apple Watch 10, and Apple Watch Ultra 2.

The watchOS 26 interface adopts Apple's new Liquid Glass design, while Apple Intelligence powers a new Workout Buddy feature that provides personalized, spoken motivation. There's also a new layout for the Workout app, and it now offers music to listen to based on your tastes and workout type. Apple Watch now also supports Live Translation in Messages.


watchOS 26 is available for testing now through the Apple Developer Program, and a public beta will be available through the Apple Beta Software Program next month.

items.title: iOS 26 电池设置全面升级 (原标题: iOS 26 Features Battery Settings Overhaul)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iOS 26 电池设置全面升级

在 iOS 26 中，苹果对“设置”应用中的“电池”部分进行了重大更新，旨在为用户提供更深入的 iPhone 电池使用情况分析，以及更精细的电池管理工具。

### 新电池界面概览

新的电池界面顶部会显示当前电池电量和上次充电的时间。如果 iPhone 正在充电，它还会告知距离充满电所需的大致剩余时间。

### 电池使用情况视图的革新

*   **周视图取代日/10天视图**：电池使用情况不再按24小时和10天划分，而是提供一个每周平均电池使用情况的视图。
*   **新增使用对比功能**：新功能会比较当前电池使用量与日常平均水平，让用户了解当天是比平时使用更多、相同还是更少的电量。
*   **应用耗电详情**：更容易识别哪些应用正在大量消耗电池。应用耗电量会包含具体细节，例如：
    *   应用在后台运行时间是否过长。
    *   应用在屏幕上的显示时间是否过长。
    *   应用发送的通知数量是否异常增多。
*   **历史数据追溯**：用户可以回溯查看过去7天的每日电池使用情况，并获得活跃使用和屏幕空闲使用时长的详细分类。同时，还会显示每次充电的时间点和持续时长。

![iOS 26 电池设置界面](https://images.macrumors.com/t/tr7Ifu525nk1pYw-jH78ZXdPL2M=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-battery-overhaul-1.jpg?lossy)

![iOS 26 电池使用详情](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1RtywD4lbUmI2o0SwztlpyiNatw=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-battery-overhaul-2.jpg?lossy)

### 现有功能与新电源模式

*   **保留“电池健康”和“充电限制”**：用户仍然可以在“电池健康”部分查看充电循环次数和最大容量，并在“充电限制”部分将充电限制在80%。
*   **新增“电源模式”选项**：除了现有的低电量模式，还引入了全新的“自适应电源模式”（Adaptive Power Mode）。
    *   **自适应电源模式**：该模式能够检测到 iPhone 使用量高于正常水平时，自动进行细微的性能调整，例如降低显示屏亮度，以有效延长电池续航时间。

![自适应电源模式](https://images.macrumors.com/t/B1wNfW9fwWdtz75DMv2xFEF5JrI=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/adaptive-power-mode.jpg?lossy)

### 可用性

这些新的电池功能将适用于 iOS 26 和 iPadOS 26。目前，iOS 26 仅限于开发者使用，公众测试版预计下个月推出，并计划于今年9月向公众正式发布。值得注意的是，Mac 设备的电池显示方式并未在此次更新中改变。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 对电池设置进行了全面升级，提供更深入的电池使用分析。新界面包含每周平均使用视图和与日常平均水平的对比，并详细显示应用耗电原因。此外，还引入了全新的“自适应电源模式”，可根据使用情况自动调整以延长电池续航。这些功能适用于 iOS 26 和 iPadOS 26，将于9月正式发布。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 电池设置全面升级
items.content:
In iOS 26, Apple updated the Battery section of the Settings app to provide a much more in-depth look at how your iPhone usage impacts battery life and how much battery apps are draining, plus there are new battery management tools.


At the top of the Battery interface, there's a readout of your current battery and the time that you last charged. If your ‌iPhone‌ is currently charging, it will let you know how much time is remaining until a full charge.

Battery usage is no longer split by 24 hours and 10 days, with Apple providing just a weekly view of average battery use along with a comparison of how much battery you're currently using compared to your typical average.

The new comparison feature will let you know if you're using more, the same, or less battery life than you do on most days. It shows which apps used more battery and by how much, which makes it easier to tell what's draining your battery.

App battery usage includes specific details, such as letting you know if an app ran in the background longer, was on your screen longer, or sent more notifications than normal.

You can tap back through the previous 7 days to see how much battery you used on a given day, with a breakdown for active use and screen idle use. It also shows when you charged and for how long.


There's still a Battery Health section where you can see charge cycles and maximum capacity and a Charge Limit section where you can limit charging to 80 percent. Apple also added a new Power Mode option where you can toggle on Low Power Mode or the new Adaptive Power Mode. Adaptive Power Mode detects when ‌iPhone‌ usage is higher than normal and makes small performance adjustments like lowering display brightness to extend battery life.


These new battery features are available in ‌iOS 26‌ and iPadOS 26, but Apple hasn't changed the Mac battery readouts. ‌iOS 26‌ is limited to developers right now, though a public beta is coming next month. ‌iOS 26‌ will launch to the public in September.

items.title: iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS Tahoe 公测版将于七月发布 (原标题: iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS Tahoe Public Betas Launching in July)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### Apple 2025年软件公测版发布计划

苹果公司宣布，其最新软件更新，包括iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe等，将在7月面向公众发布公测版。

#### 当前状态与发布时间

*   目前，这些新软件更新仅供开发者使用。
*   苹果计划在“下个月”（即7月）发布公测版。
*   这一时间表符合苹果长期以来的惯例，即在7月发布公测版，以便在更广泛的公测推广之前，通过几轮开发者测试进行功能完善。

#### 历史发布日期参考

为了提供发布时间的参考，文章列举了苹果过去iOS公测版的发布日期：

*   iOS 18：7月15日
*   iOS 17：7月12日
*   iOS 16：7月11日
*   iOS 15：6月30日
*   iOS 14：7月9日

#### 预计发布窗口

*   苹果倾向于在月中发布公测版。
*   因此，我们可能会在6月14日那一周或前一周获得公测版。
*   公测版通常在第二个或第三个开发者测试版之后发布，具体取决于时间和需要修复和完善的内容。

#### 包含的公测版

苹果将提供以下软件的公测版：

*   iOS
*   iPadOS
*   macOS
*   tvOS
*   watchOS
*   HomePod Software 26
*   AirPods 固件：值得注意的是，苹果的测试版网站表示AirPods固件也将作为公测选项提供，这通常不提供给公测用户。

![apple beta 26 lineup](https://images.macrumors.com/t/GE2arSJGowUmLVW6ckpqMdzKOaI=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/apple-beta-26-lineup.jpg?lossy)

#### 不包含的公测版

*   苹果不计划提供visionOS的公测版，该更新将继续仅限于开发者。

#### 最终发布

*   在经过开发者测试和公测阶段后，这些新软件更新将于今年秋季正式向公众发布。
items.shortSummary: 苹果宣布iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS Tahoe、watchOS 26和tvOS 26的公测版将于7月发布。目前仅供开发者使用，公测版预计在7月中旬推出，通常在第二或第三个开发者测试版之后。公测版将涵盖iOS、iPadOS、macOS、tvOS、watchOS、HomePod Software 26及AirPods固件，但visionOS除外。最终版本将于秋季发布。
items.translated_title: iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS Tahoe 公测版将于七月发布
items.content:
While the new software updates that Apple showed off today are only available to developers at the current time, Apple does plan to release public betas.


In the fine print for most of its software announcements, Apple says that public betas for iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS Tahoe, watchOS 26, and tvOS 26 will be coming "next month," aka July. Apple has been releasing public betas during July for quite some time now, as the timeline allows for a few rounds of developer beta testing for feature refinements before a wider beta rollout.

So when in July will we get the public beta? Here are Apple's past release dates:

  • iOS 18 - July 15

  • iOS 17 - July 12

  • iOS 16 - July 11

  • iOS 15 - June 30

  • iOS 14 - July 9


Apple tends to aim for around the middle of the month, so we could get the public betas the week of June 14, but the week before is a possibility too. The public beta usually follows the second or third developer beta, depending on timing and what needs to be fixed and refined.

Apple will provide public betas of iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, HomePod Software 26, and the AirPods firmware. Apple doesn't typically provide beta firmware updates for public beta testers, but the company's beta website says it will be an option. Apple doesn't plan to offer a visionOS public beta, and that update will remain limited to developers.

After the developer beta and the public beta testing period, the new software updates will see a public launch in the fall.

items.title: 苹果在WWDC 2025上9分钟内发布的所有内容 (原标题: Everything Apple Announced at WWDC 2025 in 9 Minutes)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## WWDC 2025 苹果发布会摘要

本次WWDC 2025的苹果主题演讲活动中，苹果发布了多项重大更新，涵盖了iOS、iPadOS和macOS等多个平台。以下是本次发布会的主要内容：

### 1. 全新的“Liquid Glass”设计语言

*   苹果推出了名为“Liquid Glass”的全新设计语言，将应用于iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS Tahoe、watchOS 26、tvOS 26、visionOS 26和CarPlay，旨在统一苹果的软件设计。

### 2. iOS 26

*   **主要更新：**
    *   采用“Liquid Glass”设计。
    *   新增实时翻译功能，支持Messages、FaceTime和Phone应用。
    *   重新设计的Phone应用。
    *   Visual Intelligence现在可以搜索屏幕内容。
    *   ChatGPT集成到Apple的Image Playground中。
    *   Messages应用新增功能，包括投票和设置背景图片。
    *   新增“Games”应用，整合Game Center、Library和Arcade。
    *   Reminders和Notes应用新增四个功能。
    *   新增“Clear Look”选项，与Light和Dark Mode并存。
    *   新增“Adaptive Power”选项，延长电池续航。
    *   显示电池充电所需时间。
    *   为Apple News+订阅者新增“Emoji Game”。
    *   增强了iPhone上的登机牌功能。
    *   新增背景声音。
*   **兼容性：**
    *   兼容iPhone 11及更新机型。

### 3. iPadOS 26

*   **主要更新：**
    *   引入窗口化、菜单栏和指针等功能，使iPad更像Mac。
    *   Files应用得到改进。
    *   包含Phone应用，支持来电筛选和保持协助。
*   **兼容性：**
    *   支持特定iPad型号（文章未明确列出）。

### 4. macOS Tahoe

*   **主要更新：**
    *   采用Liquid Glass设计。
    *   包含Phone应用，支持实时翻译。
    *   Spotlight功能得到增强，新增Quick Keys。
    *   Journal应用登陆Mac。
    *   Launchpad转换为App Library。
*   **兼容性：**
    *   支持特定Mac型号（文章列出了部分支持的型号，但可能不完整）。
    *   部分Intel Mac在升级到macOS Tahoe后将不再获得更新。

### 5. CarPlay

*   **主要更新：**
    *   新增小组件和Live Activities。
    *   改进了iPhone Car Keys功能。
*   **合作厂商：**
    *   13个汽车品牌将很快提供iPhone Car Keys功能。

### 6. watchOS 26

*   **主要更新：**
    *   推出AI驱动的“Workout Buddy”。
*   **兼容性：**
    *   支持特定Apple Watch型号（文章未明确列出）。

### 7. visionOS 26

*   **主要更新：**
    *   新增空间小组件、共享体验和增强的Personas。

### 8. tvOS 26

*   **主要更新：**
    *   采用Liquid Glass设计，但部分旧款Apple TV型号不包含此更新。
*   **兼容性：**
    *   支持特定Apple TV型号（文章未明确列出）。

### 9. AirPods

*   iOS 26带来新的AirPods功能。
*   发布了AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4的新Beta固件。

### 10. 其他公告

*   个性化Siri功能尚未准备就绪。
*   发布了iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe的首个开发者Beta版。
*   发布了Foundation Models Framework，供开发者利用AI。
*   iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe的公共Beta版将于7月发布，正式版将于9月发布。

### 11. 新AirTag

*   新款AirTag即将发布，可能在2025年中期发布。
items.shortSummary: WWDC 2025上，苹果发布了全新的“Liquid Glass”设计语言，应用于iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS Tahoe等多个平台。iOS 26新增实时翻译、重新设计的Phone应用等功能。iPadOS 26引入窗口化、菜单栏等，更像Mac。macOS Tahoe增强了Spotlight。CarPlay新增小组件。watchOS 26推出AI驱动的“Workout Buddy”。visionOS 26新增空间小组件。tvOS 26采用Liquid Glass设计。此外，还发布了新的AirTag，以及iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe的开发者Beta版。

items.title: iOS 26 中的新背景音效 (原标题: Here Are the New Background Sounds in iOS 26)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iOS 26 新增背景音效

随着 iOS 26 的发布，苹果公司为其“背景音效”功能增加了大量新选项。这项辅助功能允许 iPhone 播放舒缓的背景噪音，例如白噪音或雨声，以帮助用户放松或集中注意力。

![iOS 26 背景音效](https://images.macrumors.com/t/LuKyd-Vtf4ONMpOQDQoIgymIy4U4=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-background-sounds.jpg?lossy)

### 音效数量翻倍

在 iOS 26 之前，背景音效只有八种选项，而现在总数已增加到十六种。新增的八种音效包括：

*   Babble (嘈杂声)
*   Steam (蒸汽声)
*   Airplane (飞机声)
*   Boat (船声)
*   Bus (巴士声)
*   Train (火车声)
*   Rain on Roof (屋顶雨声)
*   Quiet Night (安静夜晚)

这些新音效加入了原有的八种，它们是：

*   Balanced Noise (平衡噪音)
*   Bright Noise (明亮噪音)
*   Dark Noise (黑暗噪音)
*   Ocean (海洋声)
*   Rain (雨声)
*   Stream (溪流声)
*   Night (夜晚声)
*   Fire (火焰声)

### 如何启用和使用

用户可以在“设置”应用中启用背景音效，具体路径为：

*   **设置 (Settings)** > **辅助功能 (Accessibility)** > **音频与视觉 (Audio and Visual)** > **背景音效 (Background Sounds)**。

一旦启用并选择好音效，用户可以通过“控制中心”中的“听觉辅助功能”快捷方式来快速开启或关闭背景音效。

### 发布时间

目前，iOS 26 仅供开发者使用。苹果计划在七月发布公开测试版，并预计在九月与新款 iPhone 一同正式推出该软件。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 为其“背景音效”功能新增了8种选项，使总数达到16种。这项辅助功能提供舒缓的背景噪音，如雨声、白噪音等。新增音效包括嘈杂声、蒸汽声、飞机声等。用户可在“设置”中启用，并通过控制中心快速切换。iOS 26 目前为开发者测试版，预计将于9月正式发布。
items.content:
With iOS 26, Apple added a bunch of new options for the Background Sounds feature. If you're unfamiliar with it, it is an Accessibility option that allows your iPhone to play soothing background noise, like white noise or rain.


Prior to ‌iOS 26‌, there were eight Background Sounds options, but now there are a total of sixteen. Here's what's new:

  • Babble

  • Steam

  • Airplane

  • Boat

  • Bus

  • Train

  • Rain on Roof

  • Quiet Night


These join the original eight, which include Balanced Noise, Bright Noise, Dark Noise, Ocean, Rain, Stream, Night, and Fire.

Background Sounds can be toggled on in the Settings app under Accessibility > Audio and Visual > Background Sounds. Once you've opted in and selected a sound, you can toggle Background Sounds on and off through the Hearing Accessibility shortcut in the Control Center.

‌iOS 26‌ is only available for developers right now, but Apple plans to release a public beta in July. The software will launch in September alongside new iPhones.

items.title: iOS 26：所有小改动 (原标题: iOS 26: All the Little Changes)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
苹果在iOS 26中引入了大量新功能，其中一些在主题演讲中重点介绍，另一些则悄然添加。本文汇总了此次更新中一些虽小但实用的改动。

![iOS 26 Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 主要改动和新功能

*   **主屏幕指示条 (Home bar):** 在应用中基本移除。打开应用时短暂显示，随后消失。
*   **卫星天气 (Satellite Weather):** 在没有蜂窝或Wi-Fi信号时，可通过卫星连接获取天气更新（测试版中尚未上线）。
*   **闹钟 (Alarms):** 可自定义闹钟的小睡时长。
*   **相机 (Camera):** iPhone能检测到镜头是否脏污，并建议用户清洁。
*   **听写 (Dictation):** 在使用听写功能时，如果需要，可以拼写单词或名称。
*   **信息 (Messages):**
    *   **部分文本选择:** 现在可以只选择文本气泡中的部分文本，而无需选择整个气泡。
    *   **群组文本 (Group Texts):** 群聊中增加了打字指示器；如果群聊中有不认识的人，还新增了“添加联系人”按钮。
    *   **信息过滤 (Messages Filtering):** 如果开启了“筛选未知发件人”选项，现在有新的过滤选项，可以允许“时间敏感”提醒、来自企业或组织的“个人”消息、如订单收据的“交易”消息，或“促销”消息。每个类别都有独立的开关。
*   **已阻止联系人 (Blocked Contacts):** 可以在“设置”应用的“隐私与安全”部分查看已阻止联系人的列表。
*   **自动填充支付 (AutoFill Payments):** 现在可以在“钱包”应用中查看和管理自动填充的银行卡，包括添加新支付方式或更改现有支付方式的详细信息（如有效期）。
*   **提醒事项 (Reminders):** 控制中心新增“提醒事项”按钮。
*   **备忘录 (Notes):** 可以将备忘录导出为Markdown文件。
*   **Apple Music:** 新增创建播放列表文件夹的选项。
*   **文件 (Files):** 在“文件”应用中，选择“浏览”时，现在会显示文件夹列表，并提供点击展开嵌套文件夹的选项。以前需要完全进入文件夹才能查看其内容。
*   **深夜模式 (Late Night Mode):** 在“设置”的“声音与触感”下新增“深夜模式”。
*   **麦克风选择 (Microphone Selection):** 在“声音与触感”中，如果连接了蓝牙麦克风，可以选择麦克风。
*   **电池 (Battery):**
    *   iPhone会告知用户在一天中的任何时间点是否使用了比平时更多的电量，并标记耗电量大的应用。
    *   在“设置”应用的“电池”部分和锁定屏幕上，还可以查看充电所需时间。
*   **台前调度 (Stage Manager):** （技术上属于iPadOS 26）旧款iPad现在也可以使用台前调度。
*   **关闭透明度 (Turn Off Transparency):** 如果不喜欢新的“玻璃”外观，可以在“辅助功能”设置中通过“降低透明度”选项将其关闭。
*   **背景声音 (Background Sounds):** 增加了更多背景声音选项，如飞机声、屋顶雨声、安静的夜晚、火声等。

### 发布时间

目前只有开发者可以访问iOS 26的早期版本，苹果计划在7月提供公开测试版。iOS 26将于9月随新款iPhone一同公开发布。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26引入多项实用小改动，包括主屏幕指示条优化、卫星天气更新、闹钟小睡时长自定义、脏污相机镜头检测。信息应用改进：支持部分文本选择、群聊打字指示和联系人添加、更细致的陌生发件人过滤。其他更新：电池使用异常提醒、自动填充支付管理、备忘录导出Markdown、Apple Music播放列表文件夹、文件应用浏览优化、以及更多背景声音选项。公测版预计7月发布，正式版9月随新iPhone推出。
items.content:
There are a long list of new features in iOS 26, some of which Apple highlighted at today's keynote event, and some of which were quietly added. We've rounded up some of the smaller changes but still useful changes that have been introduced in the update.



  • Home bar - The Home bar that's meant to remind you that you can swipe up to get to the Home Screen has been removed from apps, for the most part. When you open an app, it shows briefly, but then it disappears.

  • Satellite Weather - In ‌iOS 26‌, you can get Weather updates over a satellite connection when you don't have a cellular or Wi-Fi signal available. This doesn't appear to be live in the beta yet, but it seems to be coming.

  • Alarms - You can customize the snooze length for your alarms.

  • Camera - If your camera lens is dirty, your iPhone can detect it and suggest that you clean it.

  • Dictation - When you're dictating something using the Dictation feature, you can now spell a word or a name if needed.

  • Messages - You can now select partial text in a text message bubble, rather than having to select the whole thing.

  • Group Texts - There are typing indicators in group chats, plus there's an add a contact button if there's someone in the group text that you don't know.

  • Messages Filtering - If you have the Screen Unknown Senders option turned on, there are new filtering options. You can allow Time Sensitive alerts, Personal messages from businesses or organizations, Transactions like order receipts, or Promotions. There are toggles for each category.

  • Blocked Contacts - You can see a list of people that you've blocked in the Privacy and Security section of the Settings app.

  • AutoFill Payments - You can now see and manage your AutoFill cards in the Wallet app. There are options for adding a new payment, or changing details like expiration date for an existing payment method.

  • Reminders - There's a Reminders Control Center button.

  • Notes - You can export a note into a Markdown file.

  • Apple Music - Apple Music has an option to create playlist folders.

  • Files - In the Files app, when you select Browse, you'll now see a list of folders with an option to tap it to expand nested folders. Before, you had to tap into the folder entirely to see what was in it.

  • Late Night Mode - Under Sounds and Haptics in Settings, Apple added a "Late Night Mode."

  • Microphone Selection - In Sounds and Haptics, you can select a microphone if you have a Bluetooth mic connected.

  • Battery - Your ‌iPhone‌ will tell you if you're using more battery than normal at any given point in the day, and it flags apps that are using more power. You can also see time to charge in the Battery section of the Settings app and on the Lock Screen.

  • Stage Manager - This is technically iPadOS 26, but older iPads can now use Stage Manager.

  • Turn Off Transparency - Hate the new glass look? There is an option to turn it off in Accessibility settings with the Reduce Transparency option.

  • Background Sounds - There are many more Background Sounds options like airplane, rain on roof, quiet night, fire, and more.


As of right now, only developers have access to an early version of ‌iOS 26‌, but Apple is planning to provide a public beta in July. ‌iOS 26‌ will see a public launch in September alongside new iPhones.

Found something new that we didn't include here? Let us know in the comments below.
